snippet.title: MOTORHEAD (AMIGA - FULL GAME)
snippet.description:
Zeus presents Motorhead (un-emulated) for the Amiga A500, a true classic from the golden era of amiga gaming which must not be forgotten alongside the software house and all programmers that were involved in making this game.

Year of release: 1992

A Motorhead game?! i never even knew this game existed till now, i wonder what Lemmy thinks of this lol.
Great little game, cool music and fun to play, i'm sure Lemmy would approve giving a few fans a slap :-D, i enjoyed playing this all the way through, the bonus stages were a bit confusing as i didn't have a clue what to do in a couple of them :-/
I have used the infinite energy cheat so i could upload the entire game for your viewing pleasure.

Hope all you Amiga fans enjoy this upload.

A huge thanks goes out to fellow youtuber alex76gr for obtaining this this game with trainer for my amiga, check out his channel for some really interesting retro gaming stuff!

Please note: NONE of my game uploads are emulated in any way whatsoever, they are 100% original recordings by myself taken directly from the original hardware the game was intended for, that way you know you're watching the real thing.
I will also always state weather i am using any cheats in the game, if not mentioned then i am not using any.
Check out my channel (http://www.youtube.com/user/ZEUSDAZ/videos), dedicated to gamers who loved the games of yesteryear.

Switch to 480p for best video quality and feel free to leave comments on my channel and vid's.

Keeping the memory of the Amiga and it's cool games alive!!!
